test_cases.title: Record visit details for a pet
description: The veterinarian navigates to the 'Owner Information' page and clicks on the 'Add Visit' button.
The system displays the 'Pets and Visits' component with a blank field for 'Date' and 'Description'.
The user selects a 'Date' and enters a 'Description' for the visit.
The user clicks the 'Add Visit' button.
The system displays the 'Pets and Visits' component with the recorded visit details.

test_cases.title: Error message for missing visit description
description: The veterinarian navigates to the 'Owner Information' page and clicks on the 'Add Visit' button.
The system displays the 'Pets and Visits' component with a blank field for 'Date' and 'Description'.
The user selects a 'Date' but leaves the 'Description' field blank.
The user clicks the 'Add Visit' button.
The system displays an error message stating that the visit description is required and prevents form submission.
